egg.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a round object with a hard surface, that contains a baby bird, snake, insect etc and which is produced by a female bird, snake, insect etc
egg.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: Blackbirds lay their eggs in March.
The eggs hatch  (=break open to allow the baby out) in 26 days.
egg.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: an egg, especially one from a chicken, that is used for food
egg.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: Joe always has bacon and egg for breakfast.
Whisk the egg white  (=the white part) until stiff.
Beat in two of the egg yolks  (=the yellow part).
egg.translation[0].definitions[2].defini: something the same shape as an egg
egg.translation[0].definitions[3].defini: a cell produced by a woman or female animal that combines with sperm (=male cell) to make a baby
